Description: Amazon Polly is a service that turns text into lifelike speech, allowing you to create applications that talk, and build entirely new categories of speech-enabled products.
Free Tier Offer Details: 5 million characters per month in the Free and Paid plan.

Description: Amazon Transcribe uses a deep learning process called automatic speech recognition (ASR) to convert speech to text quickly and accurately.
Free Tier Offer Details: 12-month free trial with the Free plan. The trial includes: 60 minutes free trial.

Description: Amazon Lex is a service for building conversational interfaces into any application using voice and text.
Free Tier Offer Details: Use credits to access Amazon Lex features in the Free and Paid plan

Description: Amazon Translate is a neural machine translation service that delivers fast, high-quality, and affordable language translation.
Free Tier Offer Details: 12-month free trial with the Free plan. The trial includes: 2 million characters per month.

Description: Amazon Textract is a machine learning (ML) service that automatically extracts text, form, and structured data from documents.
Free Tier Offer Details: 3 months free trial of the Paid plan. The trial includes: 1,000 pages per month.

Description: Amazon Comprehend is a natural language processing (NLP) service that uses machine learning to find insights and relationships in text.
Free Tier Offer Details: 12-month free trial of the Free plan. The trial includes: 50K units of text (5M characters) for each API per month. 25 custom classification API calls per month. 50K unit text per month. 3 free Redshift Jobs up to 1 MB each per month.

Description: Amazon Augmented AI (A2I) allows you to build the workflows required for human review of ML predictions to guarantee precision.
Free Tier Offer Details: 500 credits to access Amazon A2I features in the Free and Paid plan. Including: Implementing human reviews and audits of ML predictions.

Description: Amazon Rekognition makes it easy to add image and video analysis to your applications. You do not need any machine learning expertise to use this powerful machine learning service. Amazon Rekognition you can identify objects, people, text, scenes, and activities, as well as detect any inappropriate content.
Free Tier Offer Details: 500 credits to access Amazon Rekognition features in the Free and Paid plan. Including: Analyzing images and video objects within seconds.

Description: Amazon Kendra is an enterprise search service that helps you search across different content repositories with built-in connectors.
Free Tier Offer Details: 30 day free trial of the Free plan. Up to The free tier covers up to for the first 30 days.

Description: Amazon Personalize enables developers to build applications and real-time personalized recommendations using the same personalization technology.
Free Tier Offer Details: 2-month free trial with the Free plan. The trial includes: Up to 20GB data processing & encryption, Up to 50 training hours per month, Up to 100,000 real-time recommendations requests per month.

Description: Amazon DevOps Guru uses ML to detect anomalous operating patterns so you can identify operational issues before they impact your customers.
Free Tier Offer Details: 3 months free trial with the Free plan. The trial includes: Analysis of Amazon DevOps Guru hours from AWS CloudFormation stacks for applications. Up to 7,200 hours detected over 3 months. 50,000 DevOps Guru API calls.

Description: Amazon Q Developer is your new generative artificial intelligence powered assistant for software development.
Free Tier Offer Details: Amazon Q Developer is up during free during tier by the Free and Paid plan. (1) Conversational assistance for diverse programming tasks, (2) Security vulnerability scanning for over 15 programming languages. (3) All data maintained and used for service improvement purposes and user productivity. (4) 1000 Amazon Q Developer IDE usage per month. 100s of common tasks across the integrated development environment.

Description: Amazon Bedrock is a comprehensive, intuitive, and flexible service for building generative AI applications and agents.
Free Tier Offer Details: 500 credits to access Amazon Bedrock features in both Free and Paid plans.

Description: Amazon HealthLake is a HIPAA-eligible service for healthcare providers, health insurers, and pharmaceutical companies to store, query, and analyze health data in the cloud.
Free Tier Offer Details: This always free service is on the Free and Paid plan. Free plan offering unlimited data from certified partners to 5 GB data per month. Free data import. Free query requests.

Description: Amazon Aurora DSQL is the fastest serverless distributed SQL database for always available applications.
Free Tier Offer Details: This always free service is on the Free and Paid plan. Use your credits to evaluate beyond these monthly limits: 100K Distributed Processing Units, 1GB of storage

Description: Amazon RDS is a managed relational database service for MySQL, PostgreSQL, MariaDB, Oracle, or SQL Server.
Free Tier Offer Details: Use credits to access Amazon RDS features in both Free and Paid plans. Free plan eligible instances include: db.t3.micro and db.t4g.micro and 4 engines: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MariaDB, and Microsoft SQL Server

Description: Amazon DynamoDB is a serverless, NoSQL, fully managed database with single-digit millisecond performance at any scale.
Free Tier Offer Details: This always free service is on the Free and Paid plan. Use your credits to evaluate beyond these monthly limits: 25 GB of storage, 25 provisioned Write Capacity Units (WCU), 25 provisioned Read Capacity Units (RCU)

Description: Amazon ElastiCache is a serverless, fully managed caching service delivering microsecond latency with Valkey-, Memcached-, and Redis OSS compatibility.
Free Tier Offer Details: Use credits to access features in the Free and Paid plans, including: Serverless cache creation in under a minute, Microsecond response times at scale

Description: AWS Database Migration Service is trusted by customers to securely migrate 1.5M+ databases with minimal downtime and zero data loss.
Free Tier Offer Details: Use credits to access features in the Free and Paid plan, including: Maintain high availability and minimal downtime during migration. Discover, assess, convert, and migrate your database and analytics workloads with automated migration.

Description: Amazon DocumentDB is a fully managed, cost-effective, MongoDB-API compatible document database service.
Free Tier Offer Details: 30-day free trial with the Paid plan. The trial includes: 750 hours of DocumentDB on t3.medium instances, 5 GB of storage, 5 GB of backup storage, 30M IOs

Description: Amazon Neptune is a serverless graph database and fully managed graph analytics service using popular open source APIs such as Gremlin, SPARQL, and openCypher.
Free Tier Offer Details: 30-day free trial with the Paid plan. The trial includes: 750 hours of Neptune t3.medium instance usage, 10 million I/O requests, 1 GB of storage, 1 GB of backup

Description: Amazon Keyspaces (for Apache Cassandra) is a scalable, highly available, and managed Apache Cassandra-compatible database service.
Free Tier Offer Details: 3-month free trial with the Paid plan. The trial includes: 30 million on-demand reads per month, 30 million on-demand writes per month, 1 GB of storage per month

Description: Amazon MemoryDB is a Valkey- and Redis OSS-compatible, durable, in-memory database service for ultra-fast performance.
Free Tier Offer Details: 2-month free trial with the Paid plan. The trial includes: 750 hours of MemoryDB on t4g.small instances per month, 10 TB of data written per month for Valkey, 20 GB of data written per month for Redis OSS

Description: Amazon EC2 provides resizable compute capacity in the cloud, enabling users to host websites across multiple datacenters and scale their sites through load balancing, autoscaling, or external databases.

Description: AWS Lambda is a compute service that runs your code in response to events and automatically manages the compute resources.

Description: Elastic Load Balancing automatically distributes incoming application traffic across multiple targets, such as Amazon EC2 instances, containers, IP addresses, Lambda functions, and virtual appliances.
